title: What a fitting tribute to Sri Lanka cricket legend Mahela
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana Sri Lanka bade farewell to their former test and ODI captain Mahela Jayawardena this morning (18 August) as he helped his side to win the second test and the series 2-0 against Pakistan in Colombo. He scored 54 runs in his final inning of test cricket….
